posts.post_content:
So surprised why people keep complaining about this card.....
  
   
This card is a BOMB in Type2. Battalion, the new mechanic in Boros guild, requires 3 creatures to attack at the same time. And it seems like this girl could give all you need within the next turn.
  
   
Isn't it good enough?? I like it.

posts.post_content: Won several games yesterday with this card combined with Odric, Master Tactician, Crusader of Odric, and Champion of the Parish. Played Honor of the Pure last turn GG. This card is expensive, especially for a white weenie deck, but if you're able to cast 2 of them back to back with an Odric on the field it's great to see the look on their face.
